title: Want to Buy T206 Uzit or Drum
author: chris

posts.post_title: Want to Buy T206 Uzit or Drum
posts.post_content:
Hello,
I am working on a T206 Back collection of all the manufacturers. I have them all other than Uzit and Drum. I will purchase or trade. I do not care about the grade or the front of the card, my only stipulation is that the back is somewhat legible. Please let me know, email me at [url]bucklercards@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks, 
Chris
